main_definition: To have being; to be present or real.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To live or have a life.
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite the challenges, many animals exist in harsh environments.

meanings_and_examples.definition: For an idea or concept to be recognized and acknowledged by others.
meanings_and_examples.example: The theory of relativity exists as one of the fundamental theories in physics.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To have a presence; to be noteworthy or significant enough to warrant attention.
meanings_and_examples.example: In today's digital age, many startups exist and strive for success.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To survive in the face of adversity or danger.
meanings_and_examples.example: Even after facing numerous obstacles, he continues to exist and persevere.
